doc.title: Math.RandomGenerator class
doc.para: randomize The randomize method initializes a random number generator. The arguments are the same as those specified in the constructor.
random The random method returns a real random value between 0 and 1.0.
random32 The random32 method returns an integer random value between 0 and 4,294,967,295 or less (0xffffffff or less).
random63 The random63 method returns an integer random value between 0 and 9,223,372,036,854,775,807 (0x7fffffffffffffffff or less).
random64 The random64 method returns an integer random value between -9,223,372,036,854,775,808 and 9,223,372,036,854,775,807.

serialize The serialize method returns a dictionary array object that records the current state. This dictionary array object can be reproduced again by passing it to the constructor and randomize method.
